title: 5.14 can't connect to servers
body:
Since i have done the most recent patch update, I think 5.14 with the new HUD, my league Keeps being unable to connect to the servers(except for a couple games last night). I Can login although that is taking it's time every time i click on play. It gets stuck on retrieving data from server, then pops up with error connecting to server sending a message to ...
Any help would be gladly appreciated

replies.body:
Hey rr1897,

Can you try the solutions provided in the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664) Riot Games Support article and see if that works for you?
